data.title: Seattle Children's
data.meta_description: Learn how you can support Seattle Children’s through donating, volunteering, legacy giving, joining a guild, attending an event and more.
data.text:
Join a Guild

Get involved with Seattle Children’s Guild Association, an all-volunteer fundraising network of more than 4,000 people and over 300 guilds. Our guilds raise funds through a variety of fun and community-centered events, from auctions to 5ks. Learn more about the guilds in your area and how to get involved.

Our Guild Association is the largest all-volunteer fundraising network for any hospital in the nation. We serve as the umbrella organization for all our guilds, and we support their efforts by providing inspiration, fundraising advice and resources.

Join or start a guild today.

Fundraising Events

Events are a great way to help support Seattle Children’s. From dodgeball tournaments to flea market stalls to galas, there is an event for everyone. Learn more about how you can volunteer or attend an event in your area or how you can start your own fundraising event.

Whether you are looking to volunteer or give, you can find a list of our upcoming events in your area here.
